author: mrglavas
msg: JIRA Issue #1407: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ-1407. Some additional improvements thanks to the patch by Ludger Bünger. Use Document factory methods instead of directly calling constructors in HTMLBuilder.

author: mrglavas
msg: JIRA Issue #1407: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ-1407. Some additional improvements thanks to the patch by Ludger Bünger. Use Document factory methods instead of directly calling constructors in HTMLBuilder.

author: mrglavas
msg: Fixing JIRA Issue #1407: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ-1407. In several cases Document.renameNode() was creating the wrong Node implementations for the PSVI, HTML and WML DOMs. Patch thanks to Ludger Bünger.

author: mrglavas
msg: Fixing JIRA Issue #1407: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ-1407. In several cases Document.renameNode() was creating the wrong Node implementations for the PSVI, HTML and WML DOMs. Patch thanks to Ludger Bünger.
